svg.title: Testing that dynamic changes to the clipPathUnits are reflected in the clipPath
svg.script: function startTest() { document.addEventListener("MozReftestInvalidate", doTest, false); setTimeout(doTest, 4000); // fallback for running outside reftest } function doTest() { var clip1 = document.getElementById("clip1"); clip1.clipPathUnits.baseVal = SVGUnitTypes.SVG_UNIT_TYPE_USERSPACEONUSE; document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class"); }
